name: Reaktor
summary: Reaktor is a Finnish technology company that is known for its innovative solutions and well-regarded work culture. The company emphasizes teamwork, personal development, and flexible working conditions, making it a desirable employer in Finland.

categories.summary: Reaktor fosters a collaborative and inclusive workplace atmosphere where employees feel valued and part of a community. The company frequently organizes team-building events and supports open communication.
The job content at Reaktor is challenging and engaging, with employees given the opportunity to work on diverse and innovative projects that push the boundaries of technology.
Reaktorâ€™s leadership is known for being approachable and supportive. Management practices at Reaktor encourage autonomy and trust, fostering a sense of ownership among employees.
Employees at Reaktor have access to modern work facilities and state-of-the-art tools, supporting an efficient and effective work environment.
Reaktor offers competitive compensation and a comprehensive benefits package, including health care and wellness benefits.
Reaktor provides flexible working hours and remote work options, enabling employees to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
Employees at Reaktor have ample opportunities for training and development. The company supports continuous learning and skill enhancement through workshops and courses.
Reaktor takes occupational health and well-being seriously, providing employees with wellness programs and ergonomic workspaces.
Reaktor offers job stability with a good track record of career advancement opportunities, allowing employees to grow within the company.
Reaktor holds a strong reputation within the technology industry, being recognized for its innovative solutions and strong company values.

name: Logitech
summary: Logitech, a leading technology company, is committed to maintaining a positive well-being environment for its employees. This report evaluates several key aspects of workplace well-being specifically in Finland, providing insight into various areas that are crucial for prospective employees.

categories.summary: Logitech fosters a positive workplace atmosphere with a focus on community and collaboration among team members.
Employees at Logitech are offered engaging job content and are encouraged to take on new challenges, which enhances job satisfaction.
Leadership at Logitech is generally considered supportive and effective in management practices, promoting a positive work environment.

sources.title: Logitech Great Place to Work Certification

categories.summary: Logitech provides modern work facilities and tools necessary for employees to perform their roles effectively.
The company offers competitive compensation and a comprehensive benefits package to support its employees' needs.
Logitech provides flexible working hours and encourages a healthy work-life balance for its employees.
The company offers various training and development opportunities, aiding employees in their personal and professional growth.
Occupational health and overall well-being of employees are prioritized, with resources available to support employees' health.
Employees at Logitech experience good job stability, with opportunities for career advancement within the company.
Logitech is reputed for its strong company values and is seen as a desirable company with a solid reputation in the industry.

sources.title: Logitech Great Place to Work Certification
